A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I didn't love EP7\, but I eventually appreciated it for what it was.  I knew going in that Luke was going to be not what I expected. . .but come on!  Rey's story arc is now completely uninteresting to me.  Was the whole point of this trilogy to destroy the Skywalker story?  There were some great moments but overall I do not like where they took the Skywalker family.
